name: Dwarf Merge Adventure
description:
We didn't have enough time to realize all our ideas, so just enjoy the beautiful art and pleasant soundtrack and merge identical items to get the most epic and impressive sword for your dwarf!

Our team:

AlexanderNox - programming
GOSSx - programming
Snipershy — gamedesign
Nikitenko_Nastya — art (environment&props)
Linami — art (characters&UI)
r4gman — sound
